channel.title: I just had a game where
channel.description: I just had a game where a merc was contracted to a merc who was contracted to Prince. It was great because you couldn't kill any of the three, and you could only convert one of the mercs (you didn't know which), and even if you did that you still couldn't kill or convert the other merc and Prince. So Prince was invulnerable, needless to say BD won. Was fun.

item.title: I just had a game where
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I just had a game where a merc was contracted to a merc who was contracted to Prince. It was great because you couldn’t kill any of the three, and you could only convert one of the mercs (you didn’t know which), and even if you did that you still couldn’t kill or convert the other merc and Prince. So Prince was invulnerable, needless to say BD won. Was fun.
